q: Why is 'Implicit Flow' bad for SPAs?
o: Access Token is returned in URL fragment (history/referers leak). No Refresh Token possible (bad UX).
Front: Browser redirects (User visible, less secure). Back: Server-to-Server (Hidden, secure, support secrets).

q: Why HTTPS is mandatory for OAuth 2.0?
o: Because Bearer tokens are cleartext. Without SSL/TLS, anyone on network can steal them.
Load Balancer decrypts SSL. Traffic inside data center is HTTP. Ensure internal network is trusted or use mTLS.
